mapper.select: select a.member_no,a.attend_no, b.name, c.code_name, a.check_in, a.check_out, a.special_note,a.code_no from tb_attendance a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no inner join tb_code c on a.code_no = c.code_no where a.attend_reg_date>date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')

select a.member_no,a.attend_no, b.name, c.code_name, a.check_in, a.check_out, a.special_note,a.code_no from tb_attendance a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no inner join tb_code c on a.code_no = c.code_no where a.attend_reg_date>date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') and a.member_no = #{memberNo}

select a.member_no,a.attend_no, b.name, c.code_name, a.check_in, a.check_out, a.special_note,a.code_no from tb_attendance a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no inner join tb_code c on a.code_no = c.code_no
and a.attend_reg_date like concat(#{attendRegDate},'%')
mapper.update: update tb_attendance set check_out = now() where member_no = #{memberNo} and attend_reg_date like concat(curdate(),'%')
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_attendance where attend_reg_date like concat(#{attendRegDate},'%')

select sum(code_no= 20) as checkInCount, sum(code_no=21) as lateCount, sum(code_no=22) as earlyCount,sum(code_no=23) as absentCount from tb_attendance where attend_reg_date>date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')

select sum(code_no= 20) as checkInCount, sum(code_no=21) as lateCount, sum(code_no=22) as earlyCount,sum(code_no=23) as absentCount from tb_attendance where attend_reg_date like concat(#{attendRegDate},'%')

select a.member_no, b.name, (sum(code_no=20)+sum(code_no=23)+sum(code_no=21)+sum(code_no=22)) as allCount , sum(code_no=20) as checkInCount, sum(code_no=21) as lateCount, sum(code_no=22) as earlyCount, sum(code_no=23) as absentCount from tb_attendance a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no
and date_format(attend_reg_date, '%Y%m') like #{month} group by a.member_no

select a.member_no, b.name, sum(code_no=20) as checkInCount, sum(code_no=21) as lateCount, sum(code_no=22) as earlyCount, sum(code_no=23) as absentCount from tb_attendance a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no and date_format(attend_reg_date, '%Y%m') like #{month} group by a.member_no

select count(member_no) as member_count, date_format(attend_reg_date,'%H') as attend_reg_date from tb_attendance where attend_reg_date like concat(curdate(),'%') group by date_format(attend_reg_date,'%H')

select a.member_no, c.code_name, a.check_in, a.check_out,a.attend_reg_date from tb_attendance a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no inner join tb_code c on a.code_no = c.code_no where a.member_no = #{memberNo} and date_format(attend_reg_date, '%Y%m') like #{month}
select member_no,check_in, check_out,attend_reg_date from tb_attendance where member_no = #{memberNo} and attend_reg_date>date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
